title: Gaza Egypt Rafah Crossing Reopens for Limited Medical Evacuations
snippets: Reopening of the link between the Strip and Egypt is stipulated under the second phase of the US-brokered 'ceasefire'.
Gaza's crossing with Egypt to reopen under tight security and international monitoring for medical evacuations.
Only dozens of Palestinians and no goods will be able to cross in both directions each day.
Gaza's Rafah border crossing with Egypt reopened on Monday for limited traffic, a key step as the Israeli-Hamas ceasefire moves ahead, according to Egyptian and Israeli security officials.

Rafah crossing in the south, which has largely been closed since May 2024, has reopened for those travelling on foot As we mentioned in a previous post , a small number of Palestinian people are expected to enter the Rafah border crossing between the Gaza Strip and Egypt after it reopened for the mo

Officials say Gaza residents travelling on foot only will be allowed through border point, which was shut in May 2024 Gaza’s main border crossing in Rafah will reopen for Palestinians on Monday, Israel has said, with preparations under way at the war-ravaged territory’s gateway, which has been mostl

Israel reopened the Rafah border crossing on Sunday for people to travel between Gaza and Egypt, the first opening of effectively the sole route in or out of the Palestinian territory since May 2024. Israel seized the border crossing in May 2024, nine months after it launched attacks on the region.
Israel and Egypt had disagreed for months about how to resume operations at the Rafah border crossing, which has been closed for nearly a year.
The only crossing that connects Gaza with Egypt is reopening after nearly a year of closures. This will allow residents to leave for medical care or return to homes and families in the territory.

constructiveness_reason: This story provides useful information about a significant event in a conflict zone. However, without more context or analysis, it doesn't fully explain the implications or potential solutions.
summary: The Rafah border crossing between Gaza and Egypt has reopened for limited foot traffic under strict security and international monitoring, nearly a year after its closure in May 2024. Only dozens of Palestinians are allowed to cross daily, mainly for medical evacuations, as part of the second phase of a US-brokered ceasefire.

title: Jamal Murray Earns First NBA All Star Selection Alongside Nikola Jokic
snippets: Nikola Jokic will finally see a familiar face at the NBA All-Star Game after Jamal Murray earned his first career All-Star berth in his ninth season Sunday.
Denver Nuggets guard Jamal Murray earned his first career All-Star berth in his ninth NBA season Sunday.

DENVER (AP) — Nikola Jokic will finally see a familiar face at the NBA All-Star Game. Jamal Murray earned his first career All-Star berth in his ninth season Sunday. He and Jokic, who was named a starter last week, are the first pair of Denver Nuggets teammates selected to an All-Star Game since 2010 when Carmelo Anthony and Chauncey Billups both made it. “It feels really good,” Jokic said. “He's been playing at a really high level the last two years. ... It's good for him to be there because he's supposed to be there.” Murray said he was taking his pregame nap when friends video-called him...
titles: Nuggets' Murray finally an All-Star in 9th season

summary: Denver Nuggets guard Jamal Murray has been selected for his first NBA All-Star Game in his ninth season. He joins Nikola Jokic, who was named a starter, marking the first time since 2010 that two Nuggets teammates have been chosen for the All-Star Game.
